content.question: The attractions between the <math alttext="C C l 4" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>C</mtext> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>Cl</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> molecules that hold the molecules together in the solid state are best identified as

choices.label: intermolecular attractions resulting from temporary dipoles
intermolecular attractions resulting from permanent dipoles

content.answer: intermolecular attractions resulting from temporary dipoles

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
